channel.title: Smotlaku on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in Smotlaku on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Dr. Sainath Motlakunta
item.description: Sainath was a PhD student (2018-23) in the QITI group developing a ‘blade’ trap quantum simulator. Previously, he did his MSc thesis from the same group, focusing on analog-digital hybrid quantum simulation protocols.
